name: Term 1
text: Friday 7 April to Sunday 23 April (includes Good Friday – 7 April, Easter Monday – 10 April and Easter Tuesday – 11 April (a school holiday))

name: Term 2
text: Saturday 1 July to Sunday 16 July (includes Matariki 14 July)

name: Term 4
text: Labour Day – Monday 23 October, Christmas Day – Monday 25 December, Boxing Day – Tuesday 26 December and New Year's Day – Monday 1 January 2024
